Description: House is two floors, 3 bedrooms and full bath on one floor with kitchen, dining room, living room. Basement rooms have windows, another full bathroom, laundry, and a downstairs living area. Housemates are UPS students, pretty low key and just like to hang out, cook, and shoot the breeze. Propane BBQ off the backyard with outdoor table and furniture. Tons of parking, garage for bike storage and other storage. Rent is capped $400.00 for summer MAY-AUG and $500.00 SEPT-MAY. Rent includes all utilities. 2 rooms available summer through next school year, 3 rooms available staring in the fall before the semester begins. The house is owned by a 2011 UPS Alumn! She is really nice and makes sure everything is taken care of in a timely fashion.
Contact:Elizabeth Monical-JenkinsAvailable:07/01/14 to 07/01/15

Pets Allowed:100.00 non-refundable pet deposit. House has large fenced grass backyard with doggie door, wood floors. Pets are considered on a pet-to-pet basis.Furnishing:House is fully furnished, all kitchen items, living spaces, TV, etc. Each room includes double or queen bed (in hypoallergenic full zip cover), desk, shelves, and built in closet. There are also a number of furniture items that are community use if people want them in their rooms, dressers, floor lamps, etc.
